description: Adds comprehensive user profile system with view/edit modes. Registered users can create and edit profiles. Guests do not have profiles.
author: Sentinel Chat Platform
database_changes: ALTER TABLE user_metadata ADD profile_visibility, banner_url, location, website, join_date, status, status_message
scope: Adds user profile system with two-way view (owner sees edit mode, others see public view). Includes profile fields, registration tracking, and profile view analytics.
